# `polygon_to_raster`

Convert polygon to raster


## Description

function to convert terra SpatVector Polygon shape into a terra SpatRaster
 
 convert polygon to raster


## Usage

```r
polygon_to_raster(polygon, field = NULL)
polygon_to_raster(polygon, field = NULL)
```
